experience.title: Category Manager - Henlo
experience.description: Supertails.com is a first-of-its-kind platform that supports the ever-increasing pet parent community by providing trustworthy veterinary care and a one-stop solution for pet food and supplies.Supertails.com is differentiated by its unique proposition of fully digital tele-health consultation services made available through a team of highly experienced in-house veterinarians. With doorstep delivery service available across the country, Supertails.com aims to bring the pet parents closer to the largest assortment of pet supplies from India and across the globe.-Managed and expanded Henlo, Supertails's first private label, achieving a 1500% year-to-date increase in revenue.-Elevated D30 repeat rates by 42% through targeted projects, including a groundbreaking WhatsApp Clevertap journey for new customers, enhancing brand recall and loyalty.-Improved RoAS by 25% by optimising marketing spend, strategically reallocating resources to focus on customer acquisition and not repeat in performance marketing.-Optimised inventory allocation at Ideal Warehouse, reducing shipfar by 15% and enhancing CM2 by 42%.-Implemented a dynamic DRR strategy for Supertails and Amazon warehouses, ensuring optimal inventory levels, high availability, and reducing storage and shipping costs by 31%.-Developed dashboards and trackers for daily sales monitoring, brand funnel analysis (sessions to conversion), and inventory management, enabling real-time decision-making.-Launched India’s first consumer panel program for Pet Parents, facilitating direct engagement and feedback to launch new products successfully under the Henlo brand.-Achieved the Rising Star award within the initial three months of joining.
experience.description_html: Supertails.com is a first-of-its-kind platform that supports the ever-increasing pet parent community by providing trustworthy veterinary care and a one-stop solution for pet food and supplies.Supertails.com is differentiated by its unique proposition of fully digital tele-health consultation services made available through a team of highly experienced in-house veterinarians. With doorstep delivery service available across the country, Supertails.com aims to bring the pet parents closer to the largest assortment of pet supplies from India and across the globe.-Managed and expanded Henlo, Supertails's first private label, achieving a 1500% year-to-date increase in revenue.-Elevated D30 repeat rates by 42% through targeted projects, including a groundbreaking WhatsApp Clevertap journey for new customers, enhancing brand recall and loyalty.-Improved RoAS by 25% by optimising marketing spend, strategically reallocating resources to focus on customer acquisition and not repeat in performance marketing.-Optimised inventory allocation at Ideal Warehouse, reducing shipfar by 15% and enhancing CM2 by 42%.-Implemented a dynamic DRR strategy for Supertails and Amazon warehouses, ensuring optimal inventory levels, high availability, and reducing storage and shipping costs by 31%.-Developed dashboards and trackers for daily sales monitoring, brand funnel analysis (sessions to conversion), and inventory management, enabling real-time decision-making.-Launched India’s first consumer panel program for Pet Parents, facilitating direct engagement and feedback to launch new products successfully under the Henlo brand.-Achieved the Rising Star award within the initial three months of joining.

experience.title: Head of Growth & Business Development
experience.description: -Led and directed all aspects of business development to build and execute effective growth strategies. -Successfully negotiated and established 5 contracts with business partners in the pet industry leading to increased app downloads by 27% and increase in social media impressions by up to 600%-Collaborated with key stakeholders, including partners, customers, and the core strategy team, to achieve business growth objectives. -Assumed any other responsibilities related to business development as needed, demonstrating a flexible and adaptable approach to achieving business goals.
experience.description_html: -Led and directed all aspects of business development to build and execute effective growth strategies. -Successfully negotiated and established 5 contracts with business partners in the pet industry leading to increased app downloads by 27% and increase in social media impressions by up to 600%-Collaborated with key stakeholders, including partners, customers, and the core strategy team, to achieve business growth objectives. -Assumed any other responsibilities related to business development as needed, demonstrating a flexible and adaptable approach to achieving business goals.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: -Lead a team for the project Retail Allocation Support for "JDA" application by "BlueYonder" for the client "Carters".-Developed C#. NET applications and web tools. Worked well with Python and Java as well. Automated jobs in UNIX.-Worked with Oracle DB and SSMS and wrote PL/SQL scripts.-Worked with the Director and Product Owner to ideate new enhancements for existing product and create plans to implement them-Successfully launched and completed 3 large scale projects which improved the efficiency of the existing system by 39% and reduced the error rate of the system to 5%-Improved client satisfaction score from 4.1 to 4.4-Rising Star award for outstanding performance and lasting contribution and Three Kaizen certificates for innovation and improvement on existing solutions. -Was put in charge of leading and guiding 15 freshers to enable them to learn about the Retail Allocation space and the JDA application by BlueYonder.
experience.description_html: -Lead a team for the project Retail Allocation Support for "JDA" application by "BlueYonder" for the client "Carters".-Developed C#. NET applications and web tools. Worked well with Python and Java as well. Automated jobs in UNIX.-Worked with Oracle DB and SSMS and wrote PL/SQL scripts.-Worked with the Director and Product Owner to ideate new enhancements for existing product and create plans to implement them-Successfully launched and completed 3 large scale projects which improved the efficiency of the existing system by 39% and reduced the error rate of the system to 5%-Improved client satisfaction score from 4.1 to 4.4-Rising Star award for outstanding performance and lasting contribution and Three Kaizen certificates for innovation and improvement on existing solutions. -Was put in charge of leading and guiding 15 freshers to enable them to learn about the Retail Allocation space and the JDA application by BlueYonder.

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: I worked as an intern in the company Yokogawa in Cessna Business Park, Bangalore. The internship was for a duration of 2 months.Created a new product for Yokogawa from ideation to deployment.The product was an innovative parking solution that used a camera to keep track of parking slots which are available or filled and update the same on a Web UI.The project was titled, "Free Parking Slot Detection through Machine Learning and Computer Vision by using a camera"Incorporated product management techniques to come up with the best possible version on the application within the time frame and resources provided.Used project management techniques, like Gantt Chart to Kanban Boards, to provide ownership and delegate tasks among a team of 4 interns.Successfully created a working product and completed the project within the time frame requested.
experience.description_html: I worked as an intern in the company Yokogawa in Cessna Business Park, Bangalore. The internship was for a duration of 2 months.Created a new product for Yokogawa from ideation to deployment.The product was an innovative parking solution that used a camera to keep track of parking slots which are available or filled and update the same on a Web UI.The project was titled, "Free Parking Slot Detection through Machine Learning and Computer Vision by using a camera"Incorporated product management techniques to come up with the best possible version on the application within the time frame and resources provided.Used project management techniques, like Gantt Chart to Kanban Boards, to provide ownership and delegate tasks among a team of 4 interns.Successfully created a working product and completed the project within the time frame requested.

publications: [{"title":"Corona Killer A Free Augmented Reality Game Using Unity","subtitle":"National Conference on Advancements in Computer Science and Engineering In association with International Journal of Scientific Research in Science, Engineering and Technology","date":"May 30, 2021","description":"Corona Killer is an Augmented Reality game developed for Android devices using Unity 3D Engine and Google AR Core. This paper will focus on the process and the technologies used in order to achieve creating the game."},{"title":"Overview of Use of Raspberry Pi in Implementation of Machine Learning and Image Processing","subtitle":"International Conference on Innovative Research in Engineering, Management and Sciences","date":"December 21, 2019","description":"Raspberry Pi is a low cost credit sized computer that anyone can purchase and use. It is necessary tounderstand the usage of it and how to implement it with current technologies. This paper will focus on howone can implement Machine Learning techniques and Image processing effectively in a Raspberry Pi."}]
projects: [{"title":"Project CARRUS","description":"Created a new smart kiosk product which aimed to further bridge the gap between grocery stores and consumers on the go.Use Cases:Users returning leaving work to go back home.Users out and about on a stroll and want to find the nearest stores selling the product they desire.Users who frequently visit grocery stores but want to avoid waiting in line at the store.Users who want to avoid paying high delivery fees on existing delivery solutions but want to reduce overall time spent on purchasing groceries.It allowed consumers to purchase groceries from any Kiosk mapped to several grocery stores across the city, which allowed them to make quick purchases on the go, and pick them up easily on the way back without needing to go in store or wait in line.It was done as part of the AMEX All India Hackathon, in which the team and I reached top 12 in the grand finale.The process of product development began with an ideation phase, wherein we researched any similar competitor solutions and performed market analysis to understand the consumer need.Design a product to be easy and simple to navigate, with user friendly UI/UX design.On completion of the design phase we moved to Implementation where we created storyboards using cards to delegate tasks among a team of 3 people. We split the work between front-end and back-end development.This took place during the pandemic, we successfully navigated working in a remote environment and used git for version control.Using a Kanban board we were able to keep track of tasks completed which led to a smooth and easy process to get the product completed before the hackathon deadline.Performed QA validation by running through several uses cases.Worked on creating good sales pitches to showcase the judges which lead us to reach top 12 teams all India."}]
